analytics-overview.title: Analytics Overview
analytics-overview.intro: How to monitor the success of your web push marketing through key metrics.

campaign-analytics.title: Campaign-level Analytics
campaign-analytics.intro: How to read and compare metrics across yours campaigns to discover which performed best.

message-analytics.title: Message-level Analytics
message-analytics.intro: How to read metrics and compare metrics within a the individual messages in a campaign to discover how each connection performed.
